channel.title: Really
channel.description: Someone griefed my house and took my stone blocks and colored wool. I am neutral, I don't steal and I don't attack people. The only exception is when a city is abandoned I will take stuff if there if no one owns it.

item.title: Really

item.description:

[quote=“reyx7, post:3, topic:399186”]When we raided, it was already like that. I thought the fire had spread in an odd way or something, because you had your fireplace burning[/quote]This was also posted a hour ago.

Read full topic
